document_data.name: Mummy's tea
document_data.mainbody: '''Mummy's tea''' was a type of [[potion]] that healed afflictions.
document_data.Description:
Mummy's tea was typically stored in slender, green bottles. It was known to have a foul odor.

Creation of this potion required boiling the used wrappings of a [[mummy]] alongside animal bones that had been naturally dried out.
document_data.Powers: Anyone who consumed this potion would experience effects similar to the [[spell]]s ''[[cure blindness or deafness]]'' and ''[[cure disease]]''.
document_data.History: Mummy's tea was first developed in [[Mulhorand]] by [[priest]]s of [[Horus-Re]]. By [[1281 DR]], it was available for purchase from a number of vendors in the region of [[Icewind Dale]].
